projects.title: 3D Portfolio Website (This Website!)
projects.description: A fully interactive 3D portfolio website built using Three.js to showcase skills, projects, and resume in an engaging way.

projects.title: E-commerce Web Application
projects.description: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and secure payment gateway.

projects.title: Mobile Game: 'Space Explorer'
projects.description: Created a mobile game for Android and iOS using Unity engine, featuring multiple levels, enemy AI, and user score system.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive dashboard to visualize sales data using charts and graphs, allowing users to filter and analyze data in real-time.

projects.title: Python Web Scraper
projects.description: Developed a Python script to scrape product information and reviews from e-commerce websites, storing data in CSV and JSON formats.
